prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has vibrant blue skin and a sleek body design.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies agility and speed, with unique aquatic features and a clever expression.
Generate a creature that resembles a frog, with striking colors and a playful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon with a blue color palette, known for its swift movements and acrobatic abilities.
Show me a Pokemon that excels in water battles, featuring a streamlined shape and sharp focus.
Give me a bipedal Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, showcasing a distinct blend of blue and white.
Make a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller form, maintaining a cute yet agile appearance.

distinctive_features: Streamlined body with a long tail
